sentences.english: The system can even be used to spot rip currents in real time.
sentences.chinese: 這個系統甚至可以捕捉到實時的海流活動。

sentences.english: Now the latest intelligence evaluations were being announced worldwide, nearly in real time.
sentences.chinese: 現在最新的情報分析實時地向全世界公佈。

sentences.english: Design and implementation of a realtime transport cascade multiplexer in SDTV are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 設計並實現了一種可級聯的實時多節目複用器。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a device and a method for real-time stream file storage.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種實時流文件存儲裝置及其方法。

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該算法達到了較好的實時性和真實感。

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.
sentences.chinese: 實時水面效果可以大大增強虛擬現實系統的沉浸感。

sentences.english: Real-time monitor is implemented by computer and PLC system.
sentences.chinese: 由計算機與PLC系統實現實時監控。

sentences.english: What a precious gift honesty is in the midst of so much dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 在如此多的欺騙中，誠實時如此的難能可貴。

sentences.english: Extreme formant shifting is like 1/2 speed tape , but realtime.
sentences.chinese: 偏激的共振峯偏移像半速運行的磁帶，但是實時的。

sentences.english: The computer simulation and real-time control trials shows a goo…
sentences.chinese: 計算機仿真和實時控制實驗證實了該算法的有效性。

sentences.english: but some of that cost is due to being hard-real-time and not just the read-barrier per-se.
sentences.chinese: 但是，一些消耗在於硬實時和不僅僅是讀操作屏障。

sentences.english: Cook up some automatically generated graphs for your organizational meetings or live enterprise directory data.
sentences.chinese: 爲公司會議或實時企業目錄數據打造自動生成的圖表。

sentences.english: Thepath is capable of realizing real-time input, output and processing.
sentences.chinese: 它可以完成圖象的實時輸入，輸出及處理。

sentences.english: Currently, algorithms based on graph cut take pixels as vertexes, therefore, real-time of segmentation is poor.
sentences.chinese: 由於加權圖的頂點規模較大，因此分割實時性較差。

sentences.english: The recurrence formula of the time-constant of the sensor is also given.
sentences.chinese: 本文還提出了傳感器時間常數的實時遞推計算方法。

sentences.english: The computer simulation and real-time control trials shows a good result.
sentences.chinese: 計算機仿真和實時控制實驗證實了該算法的有效性。

definition: to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
